path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Coinspect/Coinspect - Smart Contract Audit - Exactly Protocol 4th Audit V221028.pdf

findings.title: Chainlink response liveliness not checked
findings.description: No liveness checks are performed while retrieving oracle data. As a result, prices could be outdated yet used anyways affecting deposits, borrows, repayments, and any other source that relies on Chainlink’s prices.

findings.title: PriceFeedWrapper rate return value not checked
findings.description: The data retrieval from the rate conversion wrapper does not check the retrieved price and the success condition, which could result in negative or invalid data being used across the market.

findings.title: Invalid price feeds could be set while enabling new markets
findings.description: The checks performed while calling `Auditor.setPriceFeed()` are not performed while enabling new markets, allowing invalid or outscaled prices to affect debt and deposits across the protocol.

findings.title: mockStETH implementation allows public minting
findings.description: The `mockStETH` contract implements a non-access controlled mint function, allowing anyone to mint unlimited tokens if used in production.
